command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3jAcJMG4wP9JZTZ.root --database JbjjhFNe4aEjNxVY9pJJsJ --execute 
SELECT id, username, role, passwordHash IS NOT NULL as hasPassword, LENGTH(passwordHash) as hashLength
FROM users 
WHERE username = 'demo_student';
